name: Proof_314 — Morning Temperature Reading (2025-12-11, 07:00)
description:
At 07:00 on 2025-12-11, a morning environmental reading was recorded at the MaMeeFarm outdoor wall surface.
Measured values:

Temperature: 15.8°C

Humidity: 74% RH

This dataset was captured under DGCP™ Environmental Surface protocol to document early-morning microclimate conditions, thermal drop patterns, and humidity levels affecting daily animal-welfare operations.
